attributes.title: horrible mistake

attributes.title: Bad do not get
attributes.review: Soon as I look at the app a nasty shriveled up Chito stepping on his last leg stared back at me very traumatizing zero out of 10 would not recommend I am so scared for my life from here on I will never ever open this app very scary I will be deleting I am so traumatized as I already said I might cry I’m sorry for anyone else that is sadly open this app😿😿😿

attributes.title: this app is a scam
attributes.review: I thought that by downloading this app I would see the bright future that this country was promised, but all i saw was a racist, homophobic rapist. I honestly think this app should be taken down because it encourages young people to take the side of a criminal in the upcoming election. I am disgusted and appalled that apple would allow this app to be downloaded.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: When I got this app I was VERY disappointed with the quality! My child’s eyes practically were attacked by an INDECENT picture of an ugly, orange, fat baby!!! I want a refund on this free app, and if I’m not I would like to speak to the manager of this app. The manager is down right unfit for his position, he makes horrible decisions and doesn’t know what he’s doing. I will be reporting him to HR.

attributes.title: Almost gave me a heart attack
attributes.review: When I opened this app a scary looking clown looked at me it’s was horrifying I almost got a heart attack I got traumatized and now I need therapy thank you very much you clown for almost giving me a heart attack with it’s petty eyes and his wrist up acting like if he supported balcklivesmatter make America great by voting someone else other than the cheeto and Kanye west

attributes.title: RIP OFF
attributes.review: This app charged my itunes account $6.66 when I opened it. REALLY TRUMP?! I thought you were a devout Christian? If that wasn’t bad enough, the app keeps crashing and now my phone is running very slow. Very disappointed, need to call priest to preform an exorcism after this disgrace tried to possess my phone. Would give 0 stars if I could.
